Review Text: Good morning Cate house hotel l want to say that I really enjoyed my staying in Cate house and Your waiter Mr Sunday was the best. We enjoyed dinner on Saturday. He was so helpful we loved having him as a waiter can’t wait to go back how he choose meal for me and my husband yesterday we wanted to check out he meet me and my husband and introduce us Chinese special fried rice and we eat and enjoyed everything. And my Regards to the rest of the staff l really enjoyed the service.

Overall, the place was decent although it's disappointing when staff are not a good reflection representing the business, they work for the ladies at the front desk wasn't friendly. We tried to look pass it but this in fact would move us to look for another place to stay even if it's cost more than to be treated as if we don't belong. The room was spacious enough for us, but the linen was white and dingy.

Quiet, serene and neat are the right words to describe this hotel, it’s also in a quiet environment, if you want to get away from the hustle and bustle of Lagos this is the place for you. A wide variety of meals that are mostly available but the kitchen closes by 10pm. The staffs are polite and friendly as well.

I was with my bf at cate house for like 4 days or so. Everything is neat n clean. Friendly communities. The gym is only for one person, everytime me n my bf wanted to go work out, it was a problem. The gym staffs were very friendly, nice n helpful. Breakfast is only for one person. I tried eating one plate with my bf n it was a problem. I broke my makeup in the bathroom n used the hotel towel to cleaned it n the hotel manager a lady.. Came to me n said I shoukdnt so it again..that next time I would've to pay for the towel...I was shocked bec where I came from towel is nothing although she wasnt rude about it but I still felt bad. Will I ever go back to this hotel again....hmmmm maybe, it wasnt that bad. They need to fix the gym situation
